subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bradley Dredge had seven birdies in a six-under 66 to take a one-stroke lead after the third round of the Irish Open in Adare. Dredge, who lost to Padraig Harrington in a playoff here last year, had birdies in 6 of the last 10 holes. Richard Finch was one shot back after a 65.
